agentData.mission: Perform a focused analytical design for estimating and diagnosing OLS models when errors are heteroscedastic or heavy‑tailed. Produce a concise comparison of estimation strategies (e.g., WLS/GLS, heteroskedasticity‑robust standard errors, M‑estimators/quantile regression, adaptive procedures), list diagnostic tests and robustness checks, and draft a recommended simulation/empirical validation plan to compare methods.
